description: This file initializes a Flask web application, configures CORS, sets up OpenAPI/Swagger documentation, initializes the database, and registers route blueprints for a product management API.

methods.name: app = Flask(__name__)
methods.description: Creates a new Flask application instance.

methods.name: app.url_map.strict_slashes = False
methods.description: Configures URL map to allow strict slashes behavior.

methods.name: CORS(app, resources={r"/*": {"origins": "*"}})
methods.description: Enables Cross-Origin Resource Sharing for all routes.

methods.name: app.config["API_TITLE"] = "Product Management API"
methods.description: Sets the API title in the OpenAPI configuration.

methods.name: app.config["OPENAPI_URL_PREFIX"] = "/docs"
methods.description: Sets the URL prefix for documentation.

methods.name: app.config["OPENAPI_SWAGGER_UI_PATH"] = ""
methods.description: Configures the path for Swagger UI.

methods.name: app.config["OPENAPI_SWAGGER_UI_URL"] = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swagger-ui-dist/"
methods.description: Specifies the URL for Swagger UI resources.

methods.name: with app.app_context(): init_db()
methods.description: Initializes the database in the application context.

methods.name: api = Api(app)
methods.description: Creates an API object to manage routes and documentation.
